entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:36 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 10:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
